thread.title: Riddle's Jewelry To Open Second Location At Mall
thread.title_full: Riddle's Jewelry To Open Second Location At Mall

title: Riddle's Jewelry To Open Second Location At Mall
text:
Riddle's Jewelry To Open Second Location At Mall October 16, 2015, 10:07 AM by Angela Kennecke SIOUX FALLS, SD - 
Riddle's Jewelry is opening a second Sioux Falls store in the Empire Mall. Riddle's current store is at 3609 W 41st Street. 
The jewelry store will take the former Hallmark space near Dick's Sporting Goods. Remodeling is currently underway and the store hopes to open in the mall before Thanksgiving to take advantage of the holiday shopping season. 
The store plans to carry more jewelry in the mid-range price point than in its current location. Â© 2015 KELOLAND TV. All Rights Reserved.
